Header.Info: Performance Monitoring Events for 11th Generation Intel(R) Core(TM) Processor - V1.04

Events.BriefDescription: Total number of all outgoing entries allocated. Accounts for Coherent and non-coherent traffic.
Events.PublicDescription: Total number of all outgoing entries allocated. Accounts for Coherent and non-coherent traffic.

Events.BriefDescription: Number of entries allocated. Account for Any type: e.g. Snoop,  etc.
Events.PublicDescription: Number of entries allocated. Account for Any type: e.g. Snoop,  etc.

Events.BriefDescription: This 48-bit fixed counter counts the UCLK cycles.
Events.PublicDescription: This 48-bit fixed counter counts the UCLK cycles.
